next.text: Input and Land Selection
Which farmers identified land suitable for soya?
Which farmers left residues on farms without burning?
Which farmers ploughed across slope gradient?
Soil and Water Management
Which farmers did not work on soil when wet?
Which farmers used bioferments in their fields?
Which farmers practiced intercropping in their fields?
Which farmers practiced minimum tillage (bullock, hoe/cutlass) in their fields?
Which farmers used compost in their fields?
Which farmers used manure in their fields?
Which farmers used mulching in their fields?
Which farmers used tied ridges in their fields?
Which farmers used zai pits, percolation/infiltration pits in their fields?
Which farmers used tree planting (windbreaks) in their fields?
Which farmers used improved drought resistant seed varieties in their fields?
Which farmers used hand dug well in their fields?
Which farmers used hand irrigation from surface sources?
Planting
Which farmers practiced timely planting (between 15 June - 15 July)?
Which farmers practiced seed spacing (75x5 cm for single seed and 75x10 cm for double seed)?
Gender
Which farmers got support from their spouse with household work while they were involved in planting and weeding?
Weeding
Which farmers practiced timely weeding (first weeding: 2-3 weeks after germination, second weeding: 6-8 weeks after planting)?
Pest and Disease Management
Which farmers practiced use of low risk weedicides (or no weedicides)?
Which farmers practiced scouting, rouging, and destruction of infected crops?
Which farmers used scarecrow to protect crops?
Harvest
Which farmers practiced timely harvesting (when 90% of pods turn yellow i.e. between 90-105 days)?
Which farmers left residues in their fields?
Post Harvest Management
Which farmers practiced seed treatment?
Which farmers practiced use of ventilated bags, barnes, pallets, and non use of chemicals?
Marketing
Which individual farmers participated in group-based marketing?
which farmers used marketing information for decision making?
Record Keeping and Finance
Which farmers kept records of production practices throughout the season?
Which farmers kept records of costs and sales, with regular updates?
Which farmers calculated actual profit or loss (after all costs and sales incurred)?
Gender
Which farmers took joint decisions with their spouse regarding the use of farm produce?
Savings
Which farmers reported that they are saving?
